snippet: A X-ray scanner can measure where the soil is full of lead, information that could protect children in mining towns against brain damage.
abstract: Study in Bulletin of the World Health Organization concludes that using hand-held scanner to map hot spots where soil is full of lead could protect children in mining towns against brain damage.
lead_paragraph: A X-ray scanner can measure where the soil is full of lead, information that could protect children in mining towns against brain damage.
